p: In the in-vivo experiment, the diabetic mice were divided into groups I-IV (having 5 mice in each). The group I was the normal one given normal saline and having no diabetes. Group II was given Tween 80 solution and was the diabetic group. Group III was given a standard drug for the treatment of diabetes (i.e., on 500 Î¼g/kg body weight of glibenclamide). Group IV was given different concentrations of the potent chloroform fraction (Hussain et al., 2019).
